awd_titl_txt: First Bouchet International Conference; Trieste, Italy;     June 9-11, 1988 (Physics)
awd_abstract_narration: This grant is for support for travel by 21 black American                  physicists to the First Bouchet International Conference in                     Trieste, Italy.  This conference is sponsored by the                            International Center for Theoretical Physics (ITCP) and the Black               American Friends of ITCP.  It will be attended by African as well               as American physicists.  Its purpose is to share research                       results, discuss current topical issues in physics, address                     problems of mutual concern, and create a continuing                             organization.  It is funded under the Minority Research                         Initiation Program of NSF.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: RESEARCH FOUNDATION OF THE CITY UNIVERSITY OF NEW YORK
